bug.summary: SVM.trainAuto is not in the java bindings in opencv 3.0.0
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4413>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4413</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Mohamed Kamal Kamaly on 2015-06-16 03:43 || Priority: Normal || Affected: branch 'master' (3.0-dev) || Category: None || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: || PR: || Platform: x64 / Windows </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>SVM.trainAuto is not in the java bindings in opencv 3.0.0</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>In earlier versions, CvSVM had train_auto, with the new version 3.0.0, the SVM class doesn't have this function, was this a decision to not include it ? </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
